messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/5328051/diff/5001/test/fixedbugs/bug365.go

http://codereview.appspot.com/5328051/diff/5001/test/fixedbugs/bug365.go#newcode15
test/fixedbugs/bug365.go:15: err os.Any // ERROR "undefined|expected package"
foo.Bar would highlight more what's actually being tested.

it has nothing to do with package os, error, or any.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=b036b65920d2 ***

test: error-related fixes
